name: Eleanor's Song
description:
Eleanor's Song is a musical walking simulator that unfolds the story of Eleanor using the songs she left behind when she abandon her daughter, Charlie. 

Interact with the music and the environment in order to unravel her memories and understand why she made that choice.

Explore the present as Charlie, using the environmental storytelling and her inner voice monologue. Unveil the past as Eleanor, immerse yourself in one of her songs and enjoy the musical experiences prepared for you.

Make your own soundtrack as you play. Each game is unique. 

This is a pre-alpha demo of our first game. It started as a Bachelor's Degree final project and we hope you enjoy this first sneak peek. Expect more info soon at Red Velvet Games Twitter.
